title: Inflation rate forecast ( CPI ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) Q3 2019 to Q1 2024
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Inflation rate forecast for 19 number of Quarters.
The Inflation rate forecast is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
The Inflation rate forecast of Quarter Q2 2020 is 1.15% smaller than the maximum value at Q3 2019.
min_summary: This bar chart has 19 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Inflation rate forecast in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Inflation rate forecast is highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Inflation rate forecast for 19 number of Quarters.
The Inflation rate forecast is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
The Inflation rate forecast of Quarter Q2 2020 is 1.15% smaller than the maximum value at Q3 2019.
max_summary: This bar chart has 19 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Inflation rate forecast in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q3 2019 has the highest Inflation rate forecast and Q2 2020 has the lowest Inflation rate forecast.
Second maximum Inflation rate forecast is found at Quarter Q4 2019.
The highest Quarter Q3 2019 has 0.28 more Inflation rate forecast than the lowest Quarter Q2 2020.
The Quarter Q3 2019 has the highest Inflation rate forecast, followed by Q4 2019, and Q2 2022. Down to the Quarter Q2 2020 which is the lowest.
The Inflation rate forecast has risen over the past 19 Quarters.
Quarter Q1 2024, Q4 2023, Q3 2023, Q2 2023, Q1 2023, Q4 2022, Q3 2022, and Q2 2022 have a similar Inflation rate forecast that is 2.0.
The Quarter Q2 2020 has 1.07 times less Inflation rate forecast than average.
